title: Titans beat up Rams, Browns blowout the Bengals without OBJ, Game Balls, Nate Burleson on parent tickets, and MNF Preview!
itunes:title: Titans beat up Rams, Browns blowout the Bengals without OBJ, Game Balls, Nate Burleson on parent tickets, and MNF Preview!
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and LeSean McCoy dive into the Titans surprising win over the Rams. The Browns blowout the Bengals without Odell Beckham Jr. to try and get back on track in the AFC North, but is Baker Mayfield the reason for their success? Nate Burleson gives his Game Ball and comments on the seats given to Jordan Love's parents by the Packers plus we preview the Monday Nigh Football matchup between the Bears and Steelers.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
